ruleSearch.name: div.newbox>ul>li>div.newnav>h3@text
ruleSearch.author: div.newbox>ul>li>div.newnav>div.labelbox>label:first-of-type@text
ruleSearch.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("a:first-of-type").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.htm/)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://cdn.shucdn.com/files/article/image/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.name: div.booknav2>h1@text
ruleBookInfo.author: div.booknav2>p:first-of-type>a@text
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookId = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.htm/)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://cdn.shucdn.com/files/article/image/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
result = result.replace(/.*\n/,"").replace(/.*\n/,"").replace(/\s*[ï¼ˆ|(]æœ¬ç« å®Œ[)|ï¼‰]\s*/,"");

if (title.length < 5) { result = result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?${title}\\n`),"") } 
else { result = result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?${title.substr(0,title.length*2/3)}.*\\n`),"") }

result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?ç¬¬\\S+?ç« .{0,${title.length}}\\n`),"");
</js>

ruleExplore.name: h3>a@text
ruleExplore.author: div.labelbox>label:first-of-type@text
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("a:first-of-type").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.htm/)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://cdn.shucdn.com/files/article/image/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>

header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}
searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl);
let realDomainArray = java.connect(baseUrl).url().split("/");
java.put("searchUrl",`${realDomainArray[0]}//${realDomainArray[2]}/modules/article/search.php`);
</js>
{{java.get("searchUrl")}}, {
    "method": "POST",
    "charset": "gbk",
    "body": "searchkey={{key}}&submit=Search",
    "headers": {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}
}
